definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Here's a frontispiece with Rosenberg in a military coat.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是羅森堡穿軍大衣的一個卷首插畫。

sentences.english: One on authoring debugger visualizers and two on debugging debugger visualizers.
sentences.chinese: 一對創作調試實物投影機及兩個調試調試插畫。

sentences.english: It features an illustration of The Queen with two corgis on the front.
sentences.chinese: 這本書的特色就是首頁上的女王及兩隻柯基犬的插畫。

sentences.english: I prefer the old fine-lined illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我偏愛線條細緻的老式插畫。

sentences.english: Illustrations, we can them. Illus- yeah doctored photographs.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以管他們叫做插畫。

sentences.english: An illustration or a logo is likely to need more sketching than a website.
sentences.chinese: 草圖在設計插畫和標誌時的使用頻率就比網站大的多。

sentences.english: The award is the highest international recognition given to living authors and illustrators of children's books for their whole body of work.
sentences.chinese: 安徒生獎是對兒童文學作者和插畫者的最高國際認可。

sentences.english: The coffee drinkers will surely love the following set of coffee related illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 下面這組咖啡主題的插畫，愛喝咖啡的人肯定喜歡。

sentences.english: Just as in his illustrations, seeing is believing.
sentences.chinese: 就好像他的插畫，眼見爲實。

sentences.english: the sheikh squatted in their midst, frowning and interrupting.
sentences.chinese: 酋長蹲在她們之間，皺着眉頭不斷插畫。

sentences.english: Some of my past drawings shown here were done on such rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 我之前放上來的好些插畫，就是畫在這些垃圾上的。

sentences.english: Sketch out a drawing of a flower with the help of a professional illustrator in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 勾畫了一個以專業插畫幫助花農，這個免費視頻圖。

sentences.english: We would like to have more cuts and photos of specimen enlargements .
sentences.chinese: 我們想要有更多標本放大的插畫和照片。

sentences.english: Design and illustration for wedding invitation and stationery.
sentences.chinese: 喜帖和婚禮相關紙品的插畫和設計。

sentences.english: The book won British Illustrated Children's Book of the Year.
sentences.chinese: 而這本書贏得了英國年度兒童插畫書的榮譽。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
